backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Internet Computer actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the successful replacement of an incorrect phone number with a new one via centralized business constants, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing brief descriptions of all major frontend source files, components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens, color variables, and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend with SEO metadata, page title, Google Fonts, and root mount element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application file configuring TanStack Router with hash-based routing and defining all top-level routes wrapped in the site layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying contact details, service links, navigation links, and social icons using centralized businessInfo constants.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with branding, navigation links, active route highlighting, and a mobile slide-out menu with a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component that composes the site header, footer, and routed page content using TanStack Router’s Outlet.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Centralized configuration file defining business name, phone number, email, hours, service area, and social media links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an Internet Computer backend actor based on authentication state, using React Query for caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Custom hook that updates the browser document title for each page and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing for the static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark theme variables, base typography styles, and utility classes for the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Implements the About page with mission, values, and company overview sections using cards, icons, and Tailwind styling.
frontend/src/pages/contactMailto.ts: Provides a utility function that builds a prefilled mailto: URL from contact form data so quote requests can be sent via the user’s email client on static hosting.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the Contact page with a validated contact form, submission success state, and business contact details.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of sample laser cleaning projects in a responsive grid with a call-to-action to contact the company.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero, mission, and feature sections highlighting laser cleaning services and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Defines the Services page React component, setting the document title and rendering a hero section plus a responsive grid of static laser-cleaning service cards with CTAs using shadcn/ui and TanStack Router links.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom container settings, fonts, shadows, animations, and a token-based OKLCH color system, plus typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
frontend/TRADITIONAL_HOSTING_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step guide for building and deploying the static frontend to traditional hosting providers, including troubleshooting and hash-based routing notes.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration for a React app with path aliasing, static-friendly base path, customized build output, and a development server on port 3000.
project_state.json: High-level metadata describing the project’s purpose, architecture, and existing features for a static Vite + React + Tailwind marketing SPA with hash-based routing and a mailto-based contact form.
